data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 4, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Pumas UNAM!
In the minute 8, Eryc Castillo (Juarez) has been shown a straight red card by referee Oscar Macias Romo.
Pumas UNAM are pushing forward but Favio Alvarez's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 11, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Juarez throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 16, Juarez to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Throw-in for Juarez close to the penalty box.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Juarez.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In the minute 20, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Juarez's Bruno Romo is on target but unsuccessful.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Dinenno is whistled for offside at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 25, Oscar Macias Romo awards the home team a throw-in.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 26, Pumas UNAM needs to be cautious. Juarez have an attacking throw-in.
Jefferson Intriago for Juarez is whistled offside.
Pumas UNAM's Johan Vasquez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Favio Alvarez's header is off-target for Pumas UNAM.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Juarez a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 39, Juarez have a goal kick.
Free kick Juarez.
In Mexico City Juarez's Gustavo Velazquez is caught offside.
In the minute 40, Javier Nevarez Juarez.
Juarez will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pumas UNAM.
Important block from the Juarez defence as Jero Rodriguez fires in a strike for Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Juarez.
Jero Rodriguez of Pumas UNAM gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Pumas UNAM's Jero Rodriguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 45, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Mexico City.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Jesus Rivas with Juan Iturbe.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Juarez's half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 51, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Juarez a goal kick.
An attacking Pumas UNAM player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 54, Carlos Gonzalez nets and Pumas UNAM now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Juarez have a goal kick.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Jero Rodriguez for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 58, Juarez have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Oscar Macias Romo blows against Juarez's Jefferson Intriago for offside.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 65, Maximiliano Olivera grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 68, Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a second substitution, with Sebastian Saucedo replacing Favio Alvarez.
In the minute 69, Bruno Romo (Juarez) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Dario Lezcano is on a sub for Brian Rubio for Juarez.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Juarez's Jesus Zavala has run offside.
In the minute 71, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Juan Iturbe (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 75, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Andres Iniestra (Pumas UNAM) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
In Mexico City Pumas UNAM attack through Andres Iniestra. The finish is off target, however.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Juarez a goal kick.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 78, Amaury Garcia Moreno is replacing Johan Vasquez for the home team.
In the minute 79, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Pumas UNAM surge into the attack at Estadio Olimpico Universitario but Carlos Gutierrez’s header is off-target.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Juarez a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Juarez.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Carlos Gutierrez (Pumas UNAM) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 86, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Flavio Santos with Luis Hernandez. This is the second substitution made today by Gabriel Caballero.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 88, Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Juan Dinenno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Pumas UNAM pushes forward through Juan Dinenno, whose finish on goal is saved.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Juarez's half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Pumas UNAM have been given a penalty at Estadio Olimpico Universitario...
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Pumas UNAM a penalty but Jero Rodriguez misses from 12 yards.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Juan Dinenno (Pumas UNAM) has received a first yellow card.
